meta.name: Test Game
meta.description: This is a game that isn't actually a game but just a test for the compiler thing üòÉ. Also, this description won't get written to disc üôÅ

meta._comment1: All keys that the compiler doesn't recognize, it ignores. Including this.

overrides.request_to_pause: Please pause and make your decision now.

meta._comment2: All values in the 'overrides' object are the defaults, but they don't have to be(obviously).
meta._comment3: Currently you should only be using 1.3, no other versions. If you do, the compiler will throw an error.

start.speech: This is literally just a test. Nothing more, nothing less.
